snippet.title: Howl :: rogerebert.com :: Reviews
snippet.description:
Howl :: rogerebert.com :: Reviews
21 Aug 2012 by emeslea on Cinematocracy- Films for the Frugal Fan cinematocracy.com/2012/08/21/howl-rogerebert-com-reviews/
Just finished watching Howl-a thoughtful and striking biopic about Allen Ginsberg. Goes well with a good craft IPA like Bell's Two Hearted. Review forthcoming. For now- check out Roger Ebert's thoughts. Howl :: rogerebert.com :: Reviews.
Topics: Social commentary, Drama, Movies, Roger Ebert, Allen Ginsberg, howl, Homosexuality
